Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Talon, Straight Shot, Quickstride
Location: Deep Earth caverns not far from the Black Fortress

> " We know you're approaching our location. You will show and identify yourself immediately. If you do not comply, I will be forced to terminate you! You have thirty astro seconds to come forward!"
>
> Perceptor Aimed as well as Talon.
>
> "If it wasnt that I know that Optimus Prime is dead, i could swear that he is here..."murmured Perceptor

As everyone got in position, anyone with sensors could make out that
nearly a quarter of a mile further down the tunnel was a vast chamber.

Different members of the group, Perceptor and Tuscon most notably, may
remember the reports that were given by Kup, Dark Rodimus or Skorponok
(depending if they were predacon or Maximal) about the route that had
been taken in that long undersea tunnel that had been dug by
Scorponok, stretching from near to the Ark just about all the way to
the Black Fortress. Here along the path, according to the reports,
there had been a chamber that at that time had distinctive minion
signature. However the report also reported that at last scan that
chamber had been filling with magma, but now sensors were picking up
something very different from that specific location.

While no one was close enough to see it, it was still nearly a quarter
of a mile down the tunnel, sensors showed this area to be an open
area, one that stretched several hundred meters in diameter, and was a
perfect circle. From within this chamber Rodimus Prime's signature
could be made out, although it did not appear that he was conscious at
the moment judging from his low energy output. Strangely his signature
seemed to be a bit muffled as if something were covering it or
attempting to remove it.

Also from that larger chamber there is the signature of something
truely alien. It was not Predacon, Decepticon, Autobot or Maximal, but
it was technological life none the less.

From in front of the group, just outsdie the range of Tuscon's lights
step figures, six of them nearly identicle to the ones that the group
had already seen before. Insectile and alien they were as big as full
grown lions. However a seventh is there as well. It looked much the
same as the first ones, but was larger, nearly as large as the tunnel
itself and about as large as an elephant.

"You have come to feed the mistress." said the larger of the figures,
its voice hissing as it did so. "Good. Your technological
distinctiveness will be added to our own, and we will become
stronger."

The creatures continued out of the darkness and into the light, thier
bladed feet echoing oddly as they sliced through rubble and rock to
attack!

(TAG)

Preston
